attributes.action: The Infrastructure of Rochford District and Surrounding areas needs to be addressed
attributes.additional_details:
The infrastructure of Rochford and surrounding areas need to be addressed and given serious consideration to address future problems that will arise from future development.

With thousands of houses due to be built and expansion of the airport and other business opportunities arising, action needs to be taken

We can't put the burden in developers, please sign the petition if you want action taken

rejection.details: This is a matter for Essex County Council.  If you have a call for central government to take a specific action, you should make this clear in the petition.
